experiences.title: Program Committee Member of ICSE-SEET 2024
experiences.description: I was selected as a member of the Program Committee of ICSE-SEET 2024.

experiences.title: Program Committee Member of SANER 2024
experiences.description: I was selected as a member of the Program Committee of SANER 2024.

experiences.title: Program Committee Member of ICSEA 2023
experiences.description: I was selected as a member of the Program Committee of the 18th International Conference on Software Engineering Advances (ICSEA 2023).

experiences.title: Program Committee Member of MSR 2023
experiences.description: I was selected as a member of the Program Committee on the MSR 2023.

experiences.title: Program Committee Member of SCAM-NIER 2023
experiences.description: I was selected as a member of the Program Committee of the 23rd IEEE International Working Conference on Source Code Analysis and Manipulation (SCAM-NIER 2023).

experiences.title: ICSME 2022 Conference
experiences.description: I presented an accepted paper at ICSME 2022 (Tool Demo Track) titled Community Smells Detection and Refactoring in SLACK: The CADOCS Project.

experiences.title: Best Paper Award at the 25th Euromicro Conference on Software Engineering and Advanced Application
experiences.description: I won the best paper award at SEAA 2022 with the paper titled 'There and Back Again?' On the Influence of Software Community Dispersion Over Productivity.

experiences.title: ICSE 2022 Student Volunteer (Virtual Conference)
experiences.description: I was a student volunteer for the 44th IEEE/ACM International Conference on Software Engineering - ICSE' 22 (virtual).

experiences.title: Social Media and Web Chair of the Third Workshop on Gender Equality, Diversity, and Inclusion in Software Engineering
experiences.description: Member of the GE@ICSE 2022 social media and web chair, an ICSE 2022 workshop about the role, difficulties and opportunities concerning people of different gender in the field of software engineering, in research, education and industry.

experiences.title: Doctor of Philosophy in Computer Science Start
experiences.location: University of Salerno - Software Engineering Lab (SESA)
experiences.description: Started my Ph.D. in Computer Science at the University of Salerno at the Software Engineering Laboratory (SESA Lab). My doctoral project is titled “Longitudinal Data-Driven Software Project Management” and regards the social and human aspects of Software Development and Management.

experiences.title: Master's Degree in Computer Science
experiences.description: Obtained the Master's Degree in Computer Science at University of Salerno with a research thesis about Social Aspects of Software Engineering called “Cultural and Geographical Dispersion Impact on Communication and Collaboration of Software Development Teams”.

experiences.title: MaLTeSQuE 2021
experiences.description: Participated in the MaLTeSQuE 2021 workshop, co-located with ESEC/FSE 2021, with a presentation abstract titled ‘Evidence and Machine Learning based Task Allocation: A combined Approach’.

experiences.title: App Challenge 2021 - VII Edition Participant
experiences.description:
Took part in App Challenge 2021 - VII Edition event, powered by the University of Salerno and Comune di Salerno for the Enterprise Mobile Application Development course.
Worked with other two students and followed by three tutors from an external society, on a native mobile app built with:
  • React Native
  • NativeBase
  • Google Nearby Messages API
  • Firebase

experiences.title: BiblioNet Project Manager
experiences.description: In a 3-months exam simulation, I led a team of 8 students as Project Manager for the development of ‘BiblioNet’, a web app.

experiences.title: The DARTS Project
experiences.description: Submitted a paper titled “Just-In-Time Test Smell Detection and Refactoring: The DART Project”. This paper was published at ICP '20.

experiences.title: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science
experiences.description: Obtained the Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science at University of Salerno with a research thesis about Test Smell called “Test Smell Detection and Suggestions (TESEUS)”.
